title: Can't get into new client.
body:
So I've made a post about this problem a while ago but it seems to have vanished so here is another one.
I haven't been able to log in using my username and password to my league of legends account through the new client.
I can get in just fine in the legacy client but when I try the exact combination to the new client I get this
"Username or Password is incorrect. Please try logging in again. If you have forgotten your password, click here"
I've change my password multiple times and managed to get into the old client just fine but when I try it on the new client I just get the same message over and over again. 

I just wanna see the replay feature at this point.

replies.body:
It was set to NA. I've changed it to OCE and now I am in fine. 
I would have never actually looked there.

Thank you.
Both versions use the same authentication server, so the only thing I can think of is being connected to the wrong region.  Is your updated client set to the OCE region, or is it on NA?  Let me know.
